skills: Promoting hotel facilities, Customer service, Hospitality, Supervising, Resolving guest disputes, Project Management, Marketing, Experienced in multiple reservation systems, Strong influencing & communication skills, In-depth knowledge of the hotel, hospitality, leisure and service sector, Able to identify, understand and give priority to urgent issues, Working long hours, under pressure and tight deadlines, Accounting, Revenue Management
summary: A highly- motivated, productive and customer-focused team player with strong communication, interpersonal, organizational, time management, analytical and problem solving skills. Reliable and dedicated with the ability to grasp and apply new procedures quickly; organize and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines and adapt readily to new challenges.
work_experience: This individual has a diverse background in hospitality, starting as a Shift Supervisor/Host from Jun 2007 to Dec 2007, where they managed front-of-house operations and employee training. They gained extensive front desk experience from Jan 2010 to Jan 2013, handling administrative tasks, customer interactions, scheduling, data entry, and revenue management, and also performed Prep Cook duties. As a Front Desk Manager from Jan 2013 to Jan 2014, they oversaw guest registration, night audits, financial transactions, and ensured compliance with hotel standards. Additionally, from Jul 2010, they worked as a Sous Chef, assisting with food preparation, inventory, and food and beverage operations.
